name: metal working machine production, unspecified | metal working machine, unspecified | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7404/documentation

1 kg of this process is needed for 1 kg of machine.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

The activity starts with the reception of the raw materials.

The activity ends with the finished machine. A rough estimation of the materials contained in a metal working machine is used.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./282:Manufacture of special-purpose machinery/2822:Manufacture of metal-forming machinery and machine tools

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Material composition of machines from European producers.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: none This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography RER. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
